articles.author: Marvellous Aham-adi
articles.title: 19 JS Libraries/Plugins for Typography
articles.desc: Typography is an integral part of website design. The typography and fonts you use play a huge role in multiple aspects of a website design. It affects factors such as readability, user experience, and even the perceived length of an article or page. It is very important that web designers get it right with typography to adequately convey the purpose of the website and its content.
